## Installation

You can install _pyCellPhenoX_ using [pip] from [PyPI]:

```bash
$ pip install pyCellPhenoX
```

### Dependencies/ Requirements

```python
python = "^3.10"
pandas = "^2.2.3"
numpy = "^2.1.1"
xgboost = "^2.1.1"
shap = "^0.45.0"
scikit-learn = "^1.5.2"
matplotlib = "^3.9.2"
statsmodels = "^0.14.3"
```

</br>
